pros: renown internationally UN specialized in child protection, comfortable status for employees, good opening and international network, possibility to find jobs at international level, mobility
cons: bureaucratic in the sense of very individualized type of bureaucracy, allowing abuses of power. Fragility of staff assessment: both positive and negative attitudes of the staff may be treated easily in an unfair manner.
